content.question: Which of the following statements best explains the change over time in the composition of legislatures depicted in the graph?

choices.label: Women became involved in politics through their participation in the grassroots independence movement.
The concept of republican self-government encouraged individual talent.
Factory jobs provided workers with increased free time that some used to participate in politics.
Participation in labor unions encouraged workers to engage in politics.

content.answer: The concept of republican self-government encouraged individual talent.

topic.text: 3.4: Philosophical Foundations of the American Revolution

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
